attributes.action: Debate Nurses Pay on Live TV
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There appears to be little discussion of Nurses Pay. 
Nurses pay is poor (a person giving out drinks on a Virgin train earns more than a Band 5 fully qualified RGN.
Nurses pay needs to be spoken about. People should know how poorly they are paid. Patients would want their nurse to have a reasonable standard of living so that they can perform their duties effectively.
Debate Now Prime Minister!!
